# Stars database with real galactic coordinates.
# i.e.:
#    Galactic longitude in decimal degrees
#    Distance from Galactic axis in light-years
#    Height above/below Galactic plane in light-years
#
# Comments can only occur as the first non-whitespace character of a line, or
# after an entry's coordinates. Comments anywhere else will cause the parser
# to fail. Comments start with a #, and end with a newline.
#
# All coordinates are stored in eqt2gal and gal2ecl as long doubles. This
# gives resolution down to about 100m at 100000 light years.
#
# Name                           Longitude           Distance from Axis    Height above plane
"Sol"                            359.338891153500761 24507.697863477533547   3796.413343524920610
